title: 1 BR 1 BTH
posting_body: ['If you’re on the hunt for affordable apartments in Houston that are cozy, clean, and cost-conscious, you’ll want to put Bella Vida Apartments at the top of your list.', 'This property has bright and beautiful apartments for rent in Houston, Texas.', 'If you are looking for quality in a great location, you have come to the right place!', 'Easy access to Interstate 45 makes getting around the area simple and efficient.', 'Situated in the northern portion of Houston, we are close to great restaurants, local shopping, and fun entertainment venues.', "We'd like for you to contact our Leasing Office and schedule your next tour with our Professional Leasing Consultants.", 'Our property has a lot to offer from 7 different floor plans of our 1bedroom / 3 different floor plans of our 2bedroom', 'Bella Vida Apartment', '15330 Ella Blvd Houston, TX 77090', 'Office Number:', 'show contact info', 'Features School District: SPRING', 'Access to Public Transportation Elementary School : Meyer', 'Easy Access to Shopping Middle School : Bammel', 'Part-time Courtesy Patrol High School: Dekaney', 'Shimmering Swimming Pool', 'State-of-the-art Fitness Center', 'Valet Living (Door to Door Trash Service)', 'Hardwood Floors', 'Wood Burning Fireplace', 'Washer and Dryer Connections', 'Walk-in Closets', 'Pantry']
